PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input annotation set name

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output annotation set name

PARAMETER.NAME: baseTokenAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type for what should be considered as atomic words to label with NEs

PARAMETER.NAME: baseSentenceAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Sentence-level annotation type

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: outsideLabel
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Label used by model for tokens outside entities

PARAMETER.NAME: modelFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Path to the NER model file

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: annotationSet used for input (Token and Sentence annotations) and output

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: verbose mode for debugging

PARAMETER.NAME: parserFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: path to the parser's grammar file

PARAMETER.NAME: reusePosTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Re-use existing POS tags on tokens

PARAMETER.NAME: addPosTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create POS tags on the Token annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: useMapping
PARAMETER.COMMENT: use tag mapping

PARAMETER.NAME: addDependencyFeatures
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create dependency features on Token annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: addDependencyAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create annotations to show dependencies

PARAMETER.NAME: inputSentenceType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: input annotation type for each sentence

PARAMETER.NAME: inputTokenType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: input annotation type for each token

PARAMETER.NAME: addConstituentAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Create annotations to show phrase structures

PARAMETER.NAME: dependencyMode
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Dependency Mode

PARAMETER.NAME: includeExtraDependencies
PARAMETER.COMMENT: include extra dependencies

PARAMETER.NAME: mappingFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: path to the tag mapping file

PARAMETER.NAME: tlppClass
PARAMETER.COMMENT: TreebankLangParserParams implementation used to extract the dependencies

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input annotation set name

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output annotation set name

PARAMETER.NAME: baseTokenAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation type for what should be considered as atomic words to PoS tag

PARAMETER.NAME: baseSentenceAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Sentence-level annotation type

PARAMETER.NAME: outputAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output annotation type for words (e.g. Token)

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: posTagAllTokens
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should all Tokens be POS tagged or just those within baseSentenceAnnotationType?

PARAMETER.NAME: modelFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Path to the tagger's model file

PARAMETER.NAME: useExistingTags
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should existing category features on input annotations be respected (true) or ignored (false)?

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Stanford PTB Tokenizer
